DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effect prior use non-steroidal anti-inflammatory Naproxen risk level tooth sensitivity cause in-office bleaching procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Naproxen Tooth Sensitivity Caused In-office Bleaching
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old patient gender present good general/oral health ; All maxillary anterior teeth present shade equal darker 2M2 Vita bleachguide guide ( VitaZahnfabrik , Germany ) ; Signed form accept participate study . Presence caries lesion , restoration and/or endodontic treatment maxillary anterior teeth . Undergone toothwhitening procedure ; Pregnant/lactating ; Presence periodontal disease ; Presence severe tooth discoloration tetracycline stain fluorosis ; Any kind medicine , bruxism habit pathology cause sensitivity ( recession , dentin exposure ) ; Continuous use drug antiinflammatory action ; Presence tooth hypersensitivity baseline measurement ; Any known adverse effect cause Naproxen ; Nonattendance session evaluation bleaching .
